resources.string: "It's not a lesson learned unless it's a behavior changed."
"The storm is not where you face the enemy. The storm is where you meet God."

"When you come to the edge of all the light you have, and must take a step into the darkness of the unknown, believe that one of two things will happen. Either there will be something solid for you to stand on - or you will be taught how to fly."
"Just like weeds in a garden, if we don't address our trials right away, they will grow and become a bigger problem than they should. Take care of things now."
"The path following Christ is uphill because He wants to lead us to higher ground."
"If I want to do it, nothing is difficult. If I don't want to do it, nothing is easy."
"One cannot prepare for something while secretly believing it will not happen."
"It'll be alright in the end. If it's not alright, it's not the end."
"Never look down on someone unless you're complementing their shoes."
